documentation.title: Namespace Declarations
documentation.standard: There must be one blank line after the namespace declaration in case use statement follows. There must be two blank lines after the namespace declaration in case no use statement follows.

code.title: Valid: One blank line after the namespace declaration in case use statement follows.
Invalid: No blank line after the namespace declaration.
Valid: Two blank lines after the namespace declaration in case no use statement follows.
Invalid: One or no blank line after the namespace declaration in case no use statement follows.
